  16. (* Flags used in OCaml commands *)

  18. ‌let stdlib =
  19.   let stdlib_path = Ocaml_directories.stdlib in
  20.   "-nostdlib -I " ^ stdlib_path

  22. ‌let include_toplevel_directory =
  23.   "-I " ^ Ocaml_directories.toplevel

  25. ‌let c_includes =
  26.   let dir = Ocaml_directories.runtime in
  27.   "-ccopt -I" ^ dir

  29. ‌let runtime_variant_flags () = match Ocaml_files.runtime_variant() with
  30.   | Ocaml_files.Normal -> ""
  31.   | Ocaml_files.Debug -> " -runtime-variant d"
  32.   | Ocaml_files.Instrumented -> " -runtime-variant i"

  34. ‌let runtime_flags env backend c_files =
  35.   let runtime_library_flags = "-I " ^
  36.     Ocaml_directories.runtime in
  37.   let rt_flags = match backend with
  38.     | Ocaml_backends.Native -> runtime_variant_flags ()
  39.     | Ocaml_backends.Bytecode ->
  40.       begin
  41.         if c_files then begin (* custom mode *)
  42.           "-custom " ^ (runtime_variant_flags ())
  43.         end else begin (* non-custom mode *)
  44.           let use_runtime =
  45.             Environments.lookup_as_bool Ocaml_variables.use_runtime env
  46.           in
  47.           if use_runtime = Some false
  48.           then ""
  49.           else "-use-runtime " ^ Ocaml_files.ocamlrun
  50.         end
  51.       end in
  52.   rt_flags ^ " " ^ runtime_library_flags

  54. ‌let toplevel_default_flags = "-noinit -no-version -noprompt"

  56. ‌let ocamldebug_default_flags =
  57.   "-no-version -no-prompt -no-time -no-breakpoint-message " ^
  58.   ("-I " ^ Ocaml_directories.stdlib ^ " ")

  60. ‌let ocamlobjinfo_default_flags = "-null-crc"
